MarketingAppExtAssignment.name: MarketingAppExtAssignment

MarketingAppExtensionId.description: This is a relationship field. The Marketing App Extension the Business Unit Assignment is associated with. Appears in the UI.

ParentId.description: This is a relationship field. The ID of the Account Engagement business unit. Appears in the UI.

MarketingAppExtAssignment.accessRules: MarketingAppExtAssignment is available to customers with Account Engagement Plus, Advanced, or Premium editions.
